reviewNotes() - Method in class ClientSide.stubs.SBench
Review the notes.
reviewNotes() - Method in class ServerSide.sharedRegions.MBench
Coach will wait for all contestants to sit down
run() - Method in class ClientSide.entities.TCoach
Coach life cicle The coach will review the notes (wait for contestants to sit down) The coach will wait for the referee to start the game The coach will call the contestants to play The coach will inform the referee when all choseen contestants leave the bench The coach will watch the trial The coach will repeat the process until the game is over
run() - Method in class ClientSide.entities.TContestant
Contestant life cicle The contestant will sit at the bench waiting for the coach to call him to play The contestant will go to the playground awaiting the referee to start the trial The contestant will pull the rope The contestant will wait for the referee to assert the trial decision The contestant will repeat the process until the game is over
run() - Method in class ClientSide.entities.TReferee
Referee life cycle The referee will wait for the teams to be ready The referee will call a trial The referee will start the trial when both teams are in the playground The referee will wait for the trial to end The referee will access the trial decision The referee will repeat the process until a team wins the game The referee will declare the game winner The referee will repeat the process until the match is over The referee will terminate letting the coaches know that the match ended
run() - Method in class ServerSide.entities.BenchClientProxy
Service provider agent life cycle.
run() - Method in class ServerSide.entities.GeneralRepoClientProxy
Life cycle of the service provider agent.
run() - Method in class ServerSide.entities.PlaygroundClientProxy
Service provider agent life cycle.
run() - Method in class ServerSide.entities.RefereeSiteClientProxy
Service provider agent life cycle.
